'''Runemaster Kastor''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The Runemaster is responsible for binding the undead of Splintered Reef to [Menzzago](/menzzago/)'s will.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [A Paradise of the Mind](/aParadiseOfTheMind/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [A Paradise of the Mind](/aParadiseOfTheMind/): He drops a [Vial of Fampyr Blood](/vialOfFampyrBlood/). One of the two needed to open the door to the [Glowing Outcrop](/glowingOutcrop/)
[Category:Splintered Reef characters](/categorySplinteredReefCharacters/)
